description: I. Letter dated 01/08/2007 from Deirdre Hutton, Chair, to William Sargent, Chair, BRE, regarding the response of the Food Standards Agency to the draft Regulatory Enforcement and Sanctions Bill (HL) 2007-08. 3 p. II. Screen shot from Food Standards Agency website summarising their views on the draft Regulatory Enforcement and Sanctions Bill. 3 p.
